channel.title: proxy on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in proxy on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to Setup Squid proxy on Ubuntu Server?
item.description: In order to install a proxy service on Ubuntu Server edition, please execute the following commands: Installing Squid: sudo aptitude -y install squid3 Editing the configuration file: sudo vim /etc/squid3/squid.conf // add a line in order to enable global access: http_access allow all Restart the squid to reflect the newly changed configuration settings initctl restart squid3 As the squid is running now, you can access the proxy by setting the default port as 3128 and using the host ip address.
